body.raw:
{
    "agent": "62d166dc8f0fae1c5b843f1b",
    "title": "Old Castle Brewery, Woodstock Office And  Residential",
    "description": "The Old Castle Brewery is located on Beach Road Woodstock and is full of rich heritage and character.   Each office has a rustic feel,  with  modern glass and steel furnishings.  Originally constructed by  New York architect and Engineer, H Steinmann. The construction period was from 1900 to 1902,  It has been recently converted to A grade office and residential suites. \r\n\r\nSituated in the trendy area of Woodstock, just off the N1 and in close proximity to the N2.  The Old Castle Building is also 5 minutes drive from the CBD.  Close to all amenities and public transport routes.\r\n\r\nThe office park consists of a number of buildings with a mix of tenants and has great amenities such as a café and coffee shop, secured covered parking and 24 for hour security and access control.\r\n\r\nThis office has 3 levels\r\nthe ground floor is 73m2\r\n1st floor is 63m2\r\n2nd floor is 61m2\r\n\r\nAll units can be used for work and residential purposes\r\n24 hr access and security\r\nFibre Ready\r\nBathroom with Shower\r\n\r\nPlease contact the agent for an exclusive viewing",
    "status": "listed",
    "organisation": "60ee916289cfca0011592430",
    "listingType": "sale",
    "listingSector": "commercial",
    "unit": {
        "bedrooms": 0.0,
        "bathrooms": 0.0,
        "parking": 0.0,
        "price": 31050.0
    },
